section_title: OBSERVED IMPACTS, VULNERABILITY AND ADAPTATION IN A COMPLEX AND CHANGING WORLD:
sentences: CLA Wolfgang Cramer presented on detection and attribution of climate change impacts.
He emphasized that absence of attributed impacts does not mean that no impacts have occurred.
CLA Petra Tschakert presented on 'people in the equation' and discussed multidimensional variability, dynamic livelihoods and climate change as a threat multiplier.
enb_long_title: Tenth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group II (WGII-10) and Thirty-eighth Session of the IPCC (IPCC-38)
